TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs extends System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按一下工作面板上，就會發生事件。The event occurs when the user clicks a panel on the . A指定哪些已按下，按下滑鼠按鈕、 多少次它已按下和次按下滑鼠座標已按下。A specifies which was clicked, the mouse button that was pressed, how many times it was pressed, and the coordinates of the mouse click at the time the was clicked. 您可以使用這個類別中的事件處理常式所提供的資料事件，來執行工作與相關被按下。You can use the data provided by this class in an event handler for the event to perform tasks related to the being clicked. 例如，如果是用來顯示時間，您可以建立的事件處理常式事件並使用此類別，以顯示對話方塊，可讓您修改的日期和時間，在系統上的所提供的資料。For example, if a is used to display the time, you could create an event handler for the event and use data provided by this class to display a dialog box that allows you to modify the date and time on the system. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`StatusBar1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `StatusBar1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您取得按下。The property enables you to obtain the that was clicked. 您可以使用此內的事件處理常式事件的控制項，來執行工作，例如顯示自訂對話方塊方塊的時機內按一下控制項時。You can use this within the event handler for the event of a control to perform tasks such as displaying custom dialog boxes when a within a control is clicked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`StatusBar1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `StatusBar1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
